Content: Trade nodes infecting each other with diseases should be based on
chance. So every turn there is a X% Chance (depending on the disease)
to infect another node. This chance should depend on the distance
between the nodes and their relation (so busy lanes have a higher

chance then less busy lanes).
Depending on the trade system
exploits (like a lot of intermediate stations or artifically long
routes should be avoided by penalizing exploitative strategies.
